home.heroSubtitle: Connecting your business to the world. Efficiency, reliability, and technology in every shipment.

services.title: Our Logistic Services
services.subtitle: We offer comprehensive solutions tailored to your supply chain needs.

seaFreight.title: Sea Freight FCL/LCL
seaFreight.description: We manage your sea shipments, whether full container loads (FCL) or less-than-container loads (LCL), optimizing costs and transit times on major global routes.

airFreight.title: Express Air Freight
airFreight.description: The fastest solution for your urgent goods. We guarantee top priority and security for your critical shipments through our premium air network.

warehousing.title: Warehousing & Distribution
warehousing.description: Modern facilities equipped with Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) for precise inventory control and value-added services like picking, packing, and last-mile distribution.

about.title: Our Mission
about.subtitle: Powering global trade with innovative logistics solutions and an unbreakable commitment to our clients.
about.p1: Founded in 2010 in Barcelona, TransGlobal Solutions was born with the aim of simplifying the complexity of international logistics. Our team, made up of experts in foreign trade, transport, and technology, works to offer a transparent, efficient, and personalized service.
about.p2: We believe in technology as a fundamental pillar. That's why we constantly invest in real-time tracking systems, intuitive management platforms, and automation solutions that bring real value to our partners' supply chains. Our mission is to be more than a provider; we aspire to be your strategic logistics ally.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a project or need a quote? Our team is ready to help. Fill out the form or use our direct contact information.

blog.title: Blog & Tools
blog.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest industry news and use our tools to optimize your operations.

imageEnhancer.title: AI Logistics Image Enhancer
imageEnhancer.uploadDescription: Max size 4MB. Recommended formats: JPG, PNG.
imageEnhancer.originalPlaceholder: Your original image will appear here.
imageEnhancer.enhancedPlaceholder: The AI-enhanced image will appear here.

legal.content: This is a sample page. The full legal content should be written by a professional. This text serves as a placeholder to demonstrate the page structure. TransGlobal Solutions (fictitious name) is presented as a logistics services company. All information, images, and technical data are simulated for educational purposes within a Firebase Studio project.

tracking.title: Track Your Shipment
tracking.subtitle: Enter your tracking code to see the current status of your shipment.
tracking.notFound: Shipment code not found. Please check it and try again.
tracking.fetchError: Could not perform the search. Please try again later.
